synopsis.text: After being away from Japan for 10 years, Azuma Kazuki returns only to find himself assaulted and taken prisoner by a group of armed men. His childhood friend, Kogane Asabuki, comes to his rescue wielding a sentient weapon known as a Bubuki on her right hand. Azuma soon learns that he too can control these Bubuki weapons. With his newfound companions and abilities, Azuma sets out on a journey to find and revive Oumai, an ancient titan called a Buranki that lies dormant underground. Along the way, he hopes to uncover the secrets behind the Buranki and the role of the Bubuki weapons. Though the path ahead is uncertain, Azuma is determined to discover his destiny.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
